name: Anime Berry Match-Three
description:
Anime Berry Match-Three is a unique Match 3 experience for PC, Mac and Linux. With anime artworks and cute and outfits.
Move the berries to line up 3 identical ones, and go through different missions. Enjoy playing at 20 different levels and with different special berries!Features:- Puzzle with simple rules
- Ability to play without an Internet connection!
- Adorable anime arts
- Bright and colorful graphics
- Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
